3667083155AC4C01B70B90224FEFC7FF.description:
Explore more
complex situations
and concepts,
beginning to
understand some
people’s jobs and
care for the
environment.

14082F730F8249C6AF74349A9BCD2A96.description: Geography - Students will use geographic concepts and processes to understand location and its relationship to human activities.

ED6B51921BA743088D1A4FB9228BC181.description:
Participate, with
help, in the group
life of the class
(e.g., help to clean
up after hearing the
signal and being encouraged by you,
join in group games
such as playing
“Farmer in the
Dell”).

B416D44662974CAB9E88C9C43272CA3A.description:
Be able to better
understand the
feelings of other
children (e.g., share
a toy car with a
child who cries
because of not
having one, watch
other children to
see how they react).

25918E85390D4E5E888744A8F51D5DE2.description: Peoples of the Nation and World - Students will understand how people in Maryland, the United States and around the world are alike and different.

2D9226FBBBEB4BA984E0D8CAEFC01F01.description:
Imitate and try to
please familiar
adults (e.g., pick up
own trash after
seeing the task
modeled by a
caregiver, pretend
to wash the dishes
and put them away
in places where the
teacher has shown
where they belong).

171E48796F144D77A6B3AAEBB271C279.description:
Have increased
self-regulation,
following
classroom rules and
routines and
guidance (e.g.,
manage transitions
between activities
with a few
reminders, use
classroom materials
respectfully).

C61E372051D3491B8CD4BA56091F3CBD.description:
Have beginning
understanding of
consequences when
following routines
and recreating
familiar events (e.g.,
try to follow the
rules of a simple
board game and
become frustrated
when not
understanding why
something has
changed, help to
clean up, saying,
“We are a team”).

2536DCB8B9084AB69A55D02C808CB5B6.description: Political Science - Students will understand the historical development and current status of the democratic principles and the development of skills and attitudes necessary to become responsible citizens.
